segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with the woman standing there drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so focused on that dish towel and the plate in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink lets in nice daylight from the garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are up to something sneaky with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching on that wobbly stool to grab some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, hand out, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's funny how they're trying to be so quiet behind the mom.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is running full blast, but she hasn't noticed yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's spilling everywhere, making a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already in it, but she's oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just too cute, like a little family adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the garden looks so peaceful through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR
